name: Tarkin (V)
Lore: 'Imperial Governor of the Seswenna Sector. Conceived and implemented the Death Star project. A leader in the effort to crush the Rebellion.',
Text: 'Adds one battle destiny if with Vader (or a Rebel at a mobile site). Jar Jar and opponent''s spies may not deploy to Death Star. Once per game may take Hyperwave Scan, Put All Sections On Alert, or an ISB agent into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
